hooks.name: ktlint-format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run ktlint format on edited Kotlin files

hooks.name: compile-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Run Gradle compile check after Kotlin edits

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full Gradle quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && ./gradlew ktlintCheck build --console=plain; fi
